title: Audio Transcription and Ambient Documentation Notebook using Watson Speech-to-Text and LLM
author: Ayushi Parida
description: This notebook facilitates the transcription of audio files using IBM Watson Speech-to-Text and enhances the output with Large Language Model (LLM) capabilities. It processes audio files in various formats (e.g., wav, mp3, flac, ogg), chunks large files for transcription, and uses a specified speech model to generate transcripts with speaker labels. The transcriptions are then saved and uploaded to the IBM Watson Studio project. Additionally, the notebook integrates an LLM for advanced language processing tasks, offering flexibility in model configuration and parameter tuning.
